Text: Wolves' owners are facing losses of more than £1billion following the collapse of Thomas Cook  Shares in Thomas Cook collapsed from a peak of £1.50 in May 2018 to a few pence  Shares in Thomas Cook collapsed from a peak of £1.50 in May 2018 to a few pence before the holiday company was declared bankrupt with debts of £1.7bn.
Effect: Wolves' owners are facing losses of more than £1billion
Sentence: <e2>Wolves' owners are facing losses of more than £1billion</e2> following <e1>the collapse of Thomas Cook</e1>  Shares in Thomas Cook collapsed from a peak of £1.50 in May 2018 to a few pence  Shares in Thomas Cook collapsed from a peak of £1.50 in May 2018 to a few pence before the holiday company was declared bankrupt with debts of £1.7bn.
